name: The Dead Prince And The Pacifican Express
name_original: The Dead Prince And The Pacifican Express
description:
The Prince has been slain. Their murderer is aboard this train. You are not a murderer, but by the end of the day you aim to be.

Use your notebook.
Find them.
No mistakes.

Requires mouse and keyboard.

Made for 7DFPS 2020, by Liam Sauvé and Jonah Davidson.
